title: Could this be Beatrice?
body: There's one single crow that's in full focus at the main focal point of the picture. Maybe it's wishful thinking, but could that be our beloved Beatrice?

replies.body: Beatrice is a raven, not a crow.
Thanks for the tip. English isn't my language.

> Ravens are usually seen in pairs or small family groups rather than in the large flocks that crows often form.

Either it's just an oversight made by the artist of the teaser, or they are not Ravens. 

Conspiracy?

Beateice has 6 eyes, so it likely isn't her.

I think she will likely be in the rework though, probably just not in this artwork.
What if she doesn't have six eyes anymore? I kinda have a feeling they dropped the whole six-eyed thing.
Look it's fine to assume that is Beatrice. But for the sake of skepticism I wouldn't jump to wild conclusions until we know more.

Honestly I think it's just a random crow, if it is beatrice I feels like it's far to generic. Beside I think it's to early to tell, this is a teaser image for a rework for something two month down the road. There not going to spoil too much, just like they only show Evelynn leg in the last roadmap.
I just find it strange why you felt the need to essentially repeat what I said back at me.
Honestly I hit the wrong reply chain.

>Honestly I think it's just a random crow, if it is (B)eatrice I feels like it's far to(o) generic. Beside I think it's to early to(o) tell, this is a teaser image for a rework ~~for~~ of something two month(s) down the road. ~~There~~ They're not going to spoil too much, just like they only show(ed) Evelynn('s) leg in the last (R)oadmap.

Phone right?
Beatrice could be any of the crows whose eyes we canâ€™t see.
